page.title: 09HEDON'S EDUCATION SYSTEM
page.content: The education system in {Hedon}begins when a child goes to primary scool at the age of 5.They may have attended a nursery before this.When they are 11 they go to a Comprehensive school called South Holderness and stay there until they are 16 sometimes 18.There are three Primary Schools in the area, {Paull C.P.,Hedon C.P. }and{Inmans C.P. The oldest is{Paull C.P.}school which opened in 1873, the original Board School in{Hedon}opened in 1874,but{ {Hedon C.P.}school was opened in 1965.{ {Inmans C.P.}school,the newest school opened in 1979. {Inmans C.P.}school has 4 male and 7 female teachers with 289 pupils,{Hedon {C.P.}school has 4 male and 7 female staff and 290 children.{Paull}school has only 74 pupils with 1 male and 3 female teachers.
